Package com.millicast

Class AudioSource

java.lang.Object
com.millicast.Source
com.millicast.AudioSource
All Implemented Interfaces:
Source.CaptureSource
public class AudioSource extends Source implements Source.CaptureSource
The AudioSource class can start an audio capture from the a known source.
